contest-event.event-date:
Aug. 17, 1929 D Wincanton Contest (Open Section)
Wincanton Contest (Open Section) 0 Test Piece Contest Wincanton Contest wincanton-contest-open-section
A Souvenir of the Opera
Wincanton, Somerset, England, UK Bourton originally entered as 3rd, but letter from E. Cook, Midsomer Norton bandmaster, in BBN 10/1929 gives split 3rd between Midsomer Norton and Kingswood Evangel.
Best euphonium: Sidmouth Town Band Best cornet soloist: Sidmouth Town Band
March ('Knight of the Road' - Rimmer): 1 Kingswood Evangel
Prizes - 1st £15 and cup, 2nd £5, 3rd £3. Promoted by Wincanton British Legion.
6 bands competed.
April 29, 2011, 11:30 a.m. Oct. 23, 2013, 9:30 a.m.
1 Sidmouth Town Band E. Barnard
2 Glastonbury Brass J. B. Yorke
3 Kingswood Evangel Unknown
3 Midsomer Norton Town Charles Cooper
Unknown Result Bourton [Dorset] Arthur Muddiman
Unknown Result Bristol and District N.U.R. Unknown
